sentence.Network_en: 'Tell monsieur what kind of shoe it is, and the maker's name.'

sentence.Network_en: 'You deceive yourself, monsieur,'returned the keeper of the wine - shop.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 你认错人了, 先生, ” 酒店老板回答.

sentence.Network_en: 'Commence,'was Monsieur Defarge's not unreasonable reply,'at the commencement.'
